title: Remove Background wallpaper option and disable wallpaper feature

requirements.text: Remove the user-facing "Background wallpaper" control from the app header so users no longer see an option to choose/apply/remove a background wallpaper.

quotes: You can remove Background wallpaper option.

acceptanceCriteria: The header no longer renders the WallpaperSettingsDialog trigger/button.
No UI in the app shows the text "Background wallpaper" or offers wallpaper selection/removal.

requirements.text: Disable applying and rendering a custom wallpaper background across the app layout, including clearing any previously persisted wallpaper in localStorage so older wallpapers do not continue to appear.

quotes: You can remove Background wallpaper option.

acceptanceCriteria: The app no longer renders the wallpaper background layers (e.g., the elements using the app-wallpaper/app-wallpaper-overlay styling) even if a prior wallpaper exists in localStorage.
On load, any value stored under the wallpaper storage key is removed so wallpapers do not persist across sessions.

requirements.text: Clean up unused wallpaper-related frontend code and styles after the feature is removed (components, hooks, and CSS) to avoid dead code and unused Tailwind/CSS selectors.

quotes: You can remove Background wallpaper option.

acceptanceCriteria: The project builds without unused-import errors related to wallpaper code.
Wallpaper-specific CSS (e.g., app wallpaper background selectors) is removed if no longer referenced anywhere.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components).
Do not change immutable hook files listed by the system context (do not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts / useActor.ts / frontend/src/main.tsx).
nonGoals: Changing backend behavior or data models.
